text: How can I zoom out in the plot window, without zooming the code window too?

elements.text: How can I zoom out in the plot window, without zooming the code window too?

text: I was hoping that focusing on the plot window then command-minus would do it, but that shrinks everything

elements.text: I was hoping that focusing on the plot window then command-minus would do it, but that shrinks everything

text: I don't think we have zoom implemented for the plot window.

elements.text: I don't think we have zoom implemented for the plot window.

text: Often the plot is too big for the window. Can it at least be automatically sized to fit the window? And scaled if I make the plot pane smaller?

elements.text: Often the plot is too big for the window. Can it at least be automatically sized to fit the window? And scaled if I make the plot pane smaller?

text: We should probably just add a generic zoom thing...
